steps.title: â€œSnatched bodyâ€ became popular during the â€œslim thickâ€ movement.
steps.content: â€œSnatched bodyâ€ became popular during the â€œslim thickâ€ movement. All body types are becoming mainstream, thanks to social media! steps.title: Maintain a healthy diet.
steps.content: Maintain a healthy diet. Fueling your body with the proper nutrients is an excellent way to get a â€œsnatched body.â€ Experts recommend eating complex carbohydrates and high-fiber food to help slim down your waist . [5] X Trustworthy Source Harvard Medical School Harvard Medical School's Educational Site for the Public Go to source For example: Swap white rice with brown rice. Add more beans and vegetables to your plate. Snack on almonds, popcorn, and apples. Switch regular potatoes with sweet potatoes.

steps.title: Work out your core.
steps.content: Work out your core. Looking to get that â€œsnatched waistâ€ or hourglass figure? Try adding more core workouts to your regular exercise routine! Ab exercises strengthen and tighten your stomach muscles and may be able to tone and cinch your waistline. [6] X Trustworthy Source Mayo Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source Hold yourself up in a reverse plank to target your glutes, back, and stomach muscles. [7] X Research source Raise your hips in a bridge pose to stretch and strengthen your core. Stretch the opposite leg and arm out in a tabletop pose to lengthen and tighten your core muscles. Lie on your back with your knees and feet up and move your legs in a bicycle-like motion to target your lower abs.

steps.title: Wear waist-cinching clothes.
steps.content: Wear waist-cinching clothes. If you want a â€œsnatched body,â€ draw attention to your physique by wearing clothes that accentuate your waist and hips. For instance: Give a baggier dress more shape with a belt. Look for clothes with tighter or gathered fabric around the waist or bust line. Opt for bodycon dresses and skirts that hug your waist and hips. Pick A-line silhouettes that have a tighter waist and flared skirt.

steps.title: Be confident in your own skin!
steps.content: Be confident in your own skin! At the end of the day, the best way to get â€œsnatchedâ€ is to love yourself. You are beautiful inside and out; the more you realize that, the more confident youâ€™ll be. So, how do you become more confident in your body? Check out these tips: [8] X Research source Unfollow or mute any content on social media that makes you feel insecure. Focus on what your body allows you to do rather than focusing on how it looks. Define yourself outside of your appearanceâ€”what makes your personality shine? Listen to your body and give it what it needs to thrive. Wear what you feel comfortable and confident in.
